finestFlights.title: Finest Flights
finestFlights.shortDescription: Front-end development and maintenance for an airline ticket sales website using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
finestFlights.fullDescription: I developed the entire front-end for the Finest Flights website, an airline ticket sales company. I continue to provide maintenance and develop new features for the platform, which is built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

theInteriorEdge.title: The Interior Edge
theInteriorEdge.shortDescription: Developed a modern website for a US-based flooring solutions company using React and Tailwind CSS.
theInteriorEdge.fullDescription: I built the website for The Interior Edge, a well-established US company specializing in flooring solutions for large builders. The project was developed using React and Tailwind CSS, focusing on a clean design to showcase their services and portfolio.

coffeeShopTiaRosa.title: Coffee Shops Tia Rosa
coffeeShopTiaRosa.shortDescription: A digital presence for a local coffee shop, featuring its menu, team, and location, built with Next.js and TypeScript.
coffeeShopTiaRosa.fullDescription: I developed a complete website for Coffee Shops Tia Rosa to establish their digital presence. The site showcases their menu, team, and location, providing a welcoming online space for customers. This project was built using Next.js and TypeScript, focusing on creating a warm and inviting user experience.

personalPortfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
personalPortfolio.shortDescription: My personal portfolio to showcase my projects and skills, built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Framer Motion.
personalPortfolio.fullDescription: This is the very portfolio you are browsing. I developed it to showcase my work, professional experience, and technical skills in a modern and interactive way. The project is built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS for styling, Framer Motion for animations, and next-intl for internationalization.

sertanejoMadeiras.title: Sertanejo Madeiras
sertanejoMadeiras.shortDescription: A straightforward website for a lumber company specializing in treated eucalyptus, built with React.
sertanejoMadeiras.fullDescription: I developed the website for Sertanejo Madeiras, a company specializing in treated eucalyptus. Following the client's request for simplicity, the site was built using React to be a direct and effective online catalog of their products and services.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Maxwell Paulo, a passionate Front-End Developer dedicated to creating intuitive, dynamic, and high-performance web experiences. With a keen eye for design and a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I strive to build applications that not only look great but also provide a seamless user journey.
aboutSection.paragraph2: My journey in web development is driven by a constant desire to learn and adapt to the ever-evolving digital landscape. I enjoy tackling complex challenges and transforming ideas into tangible, impactful solutions.
